about_the_game:
THIS IS GEOJET! 

GeoJet is a high-octane arcade experience that throws you into the pilot seat of a sleek ship racing through vibrant, neon-drenched courses. It's easy to pick up but challenging to master, offering addictive gameplay that will keep you coming back for more.


Master the Tracks:

Navigate twisting tracks, dodge obstacles, and collect score boxes to build your combo and boost your speed. Chain together boosts and utilize the air roll maneuver to achieve blistering speeds. With tight controls and responsive handling, GeoJet demands precision and skill to conquer its challenging courses.

Key Features:

  • Easy to Learn, Hard to Master: Intuitive controls make it simple to jump in, but true mastery requires skillful maneuvering and strategic use of power-ups.

  • Air Roll: Quickly dart left and right to dodge obstacles and collect those crucial score boxes.

  • Boost System: The more boxes you collect, the faster you go! Chain together combos for maximum speed.

  • Overdrive Boosts: Strategically placed overdrive boosts give you the edge you need to navigate tricky sections of the track.

  • Pulse-Pounding Synth Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in the retrowave aesthetic with a pumping synth soundtrack that complements the high-speed action.

  • Tight Controls: Responsive and precise controls give you complete command of your ship.

  • Arcade Action: Classic arcade gameplay with a modern twist, delivering a thrilling and addictive experience.

  • Challenging and Engaging: Push your skills to the limit and strive for the highest score across a variety of challenging courses.

name: GeoJet (Demo)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Blast through neon courses, dodging obstacles and grabbing power-ups in this intense arcade racer. Chain combos and hit the finish line with the highest score!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian*
*languages with full audio support
